sense.name: crash together with violent impact
sense.examples: Two meteors clashed, shattering apart. The armies clashed together with enormous force. The two boys clashed, flinging themselves on one another. The waves clashed against the cliff face.

sense.name: be or come into conflict
sense.examples: These colors clash. Their personalities clash heavily. Theories on either side of the fence inherently clash. Most notes on the keyboard clash when not played properly. My desires clas with my responsibilities.

sense.name: disagree violently
sense.examples: The stories of the accident clashed completely. We clashed over the new farm policy. The debators clashed repeatedly.
